column2: Magical Seduction
I will show her a true woman's touch.
I will show him a true man's touch.
My oh my. Try to seduce one of the devout. How potentially scandalous. \n  Hrm, to take the scandalous path, or to back out and consider a safer route. I wonder which I'll choose...
Oh, I'm totally seeing this through. [target_seduced.GetFirstName] will be mine.
I'll pass. [target_seduced.GetFirstName] isn't worth the potential headache.

I've set my eyes on [target_seduced.GetBestName]. They may not know it yet, but I plan on sharing my desire with them. And when I do, they'll be bound to me as my lover. \n  Oh how I enjoy a little game.
[target_seduced.GetFirstName] shall be mine.

I've set my eyes on [target_seduced.GetBestName] and I shall have them dancing like a puppet on my strings. Then, when the time is right, I plan on sharing my desire with them. And when I do, they'll be bound to me as my lover. \n  Oh how I enjoy a little game.
[target_seduced.GetFirstName] shall be mine.

I'm a prisoner. Either actually rotting away in some other ruler's cell or wasting away in my own useless body (prisoner or incapable). I think briefly of [target_seduced.GetBestName], and all of the progress that will now have gone to waste, for I must start over with my seduction attempt should I ever obtain my freedom.
If I could only be free once more.

While the game of seduction can be entertaining, sometimes things take place that make the game irrelevant. In this case, I've obtained the object of my desire. With [target_seduced.GetBestName] now mine, it is time to drop the game of seduction so I can turn my eyes towards another should I wish it.
I look forward to my time with [target_seduced.GetFirstName].

I find myself recalling both my experiences with [target_seduced.GetBestName] and thinking of what will never come to pass. With the death of [target_seduced.GetFirstName] I am free from the game I was engaged in, and am now capable of directing my attentions to others should I so wish.
Too bad [target_seduced.GetFirstName] passed before I finished what I had planned.

I've learned that [target_seduced.GetBestName] is no longer eligible for my continued advances. It is such a shame, as I was enjoying the game. Alas, be it physical imprisonment in some walled cell, or screaming internally as one's mind becomes a prisoner within their own failing body, neither are conducive towards the game of seduction. Alas, while [target_seduced.GetFirstName] isn't free, at least I am, so I can now consider pursuing another.
May [target_seduced.GetFirstName] be free some day.
Bah. [target_seduced.GetFirstName] is playing hard to get. Apparently my letter was not well received. \n The only question left is do I push forward or let this go?
Continue the pursuit!
End this waste of time.

My sources indicate that [target_seduced.GetFirstName] did indeed receive my letter. What is their intention by not giving me a response? Are they playing coy, or simply hoping I waste time pursuing them further? \n What shall I do?
Continue the pursuit!
End this waste of time.

Oh ho! [target_seduced.GetFirstName] appreciates the letter and even went so far as being flirtatious in their response. Things are progressing well. \n Of course, I could just end this game if I so desire.
Continue the pursuit, as it's nearing an end!
My desires have waned, let me end this.

OMG! I received a love letter from [target_seducer.GetFirstName]! Oh my, the lewd things they'd like to do with me. \n  I feel my heart flutter and my cheeks grow warm. Is it from interest in the letter or repulsion?
I have to admit, the words and imagery moves me.
I've not time for this foolishness.
How dare they imply such things!
I shall communicate my rejection of their advances.
I believe things will progress a bit better with a little push. The only question is what is the best method to employ in winning them over.
A love letter will sway them.
How long must I wait? [target_seduced.GetFirstName] isn't cooperating and I'm beginning to question whether such pursuit is worth my time.
I must be patient and press onward.
Bah, I shall end this and seek other prey.

Well now. It would appear that [target_seduced.GetFirstName] has made it quite clear that any such pursuit of them is no more than a waste of my time. Such a shame, we would have made such wonderful music together.
At least I can now focus elsewhere.

I've set my eyes on [target_seduced.GetBestName] and I shall have them dancing like a puppet on my strings. Of course, the age gap between us may raise some eyebrows. \n  Of course, if I do pursue them, I plan on sharing my desire with them when the time is right. And when I do, they'll be bound to me as my lover. \n  Oh how I enjoy a little game.
Doh! I shouldn't be targeting the player!
I'll show her a real woman's touch.
I'll show him a real man's touch.
